Je pense pas avoir besoin de faire cette évaluation mais bon... Ce jeu le mérite.
Que puis-je dire à part "Chef-d'oeuvre absolu" ?
Ce jeu est un classique, il faut y jouer une fois dans sa vie. Tout est fait à la perfection, l'histoire, les énigmes, la progression, les personnages, les secrets... 
La campagne solo est absolument géniale ! (Je tiens à dire que j'ai joué au jeu en VO, je trouve que les émotions ressortent bien mieux.) Il y a des passages qui vont resteront en mémoire pour toujours, je vous le garantis...
J'aimerais aussi noter que les musiques collent parfaitement au jeu, les cinématiques sont très bien faites, les graphismes ont très bien vieillis.
En plus de ça, il y a une campagne multijoueur, qui continue l'histoire.
Et pour couronner le tout, il y a une rejouabilité infinie avec la possiblité de créer et partager ses propres salles de test, et de jouer à toutes celles qui ont été créées par la communauté !

En bref, un incontournable.
Muito bom o jogo, recomendo zerar o primeiro jogo mas fora isso é incrivel.

Played it on the XBOX 360 way before and bought it on PC not too long ago, and I do not regret it at all. Portal 2 is still extremely enjoyable solo or with friends. The story, dialog, everything is just pure enjoyment that's full of subtle and not so subtle humor. It still holds up well and is by far one of the best puzzle games that have been made, especially if you look into the tricks you can do in this game from people that speedrun it. I've done some speedrunning of this game and the amount of new and interesting ways to complete levels is fantastic.
Knowing it's going to be another 20 years before Portal 3 comes out I highly suggest buying this game if you enjoy puzzles or enjoy some story with comedic dialog, sale or no sale I'd for sure say it will be worth your time and money.

Portal 2 is one of the greatest video games of all time. It is equally fun playing for 10 minutes and 10 hours (with the innovative community content). This is the only game I'd show someone who has never played a video game and wants to know what all the hype is about. To me it is the perfect encapsulation of the fun that is gaming.  

And with Portal 2, it's not just the gameplay. The gameplay is of course amazing with many very innovative additions to Portal 1 (in itself pretty close to a perfect game). But Portal 2 is a more complete game than even its predecessor, and a large part of that is due to how it weaves in the story, the dialogue, with the gameplay so, so well. It's genuinely funny, a true comedy game. There is a sense of narrative progression, but without it getting in the way of the gameplay, the super fun puzzles. And the puzzles themselves are often difficult and require problem-solving and creativity, leaving you feeling very rewarded when you crack them. 

What more can I say? This game is art, it's a masterpiece. It's video game perfection and a credit to the medium.
I absolutely recommend this game, it's one of my favourite games ever made.

El pene owo

Portal 2 is a near masterpiece and monumental improvement over the first one.

Story: There is actually a story throughout this game. Unlike the first one, this game actually develops its universe and lore throughout the campaign. You'll learn more about the world, the characters and the game itself. The story is well told and the writing is cleverly hilarious. 

Graphics: Even to this day, I think the game looks fantastic and holds up tremendously well despite being released a while ago. I don't know how they did it, but Valve managed to keep the game as beautiful many modern titles. The game is colorful, the details are great, and the lighting is fantastic.

Gameplay: Exactly like the first Portal aside from a few exceptions. First off, there now actual cutscenes and sequences to progress the story. This means you won't always be solving puzzles, which diversifies gameplay and provides a break from the usual formula. Additionally, there are new things for you to use to solve puzzles other than the portal gun which honestly makes the game much more interesting. 

Sound: The music is great and actually very beautiful. The sound effects are awesome. Everything seems to make realistic noises. But by far the best part of the sound is the voice acting. The great writing for the game is brought to like the stellar voice acting that gives characters life.

Verdict: 9.5
Portal 2 is a great game! The only thing that bothered me was that it drags on towards the end. I feel like the game could have gone without some of the last segments and Valve should have instead made them additional levels to play after you've beaten the game. But this is literally the only issue I have with the game. I think everything else is perfectly done.

Havia comprado o jogo há algum tempo, porém nunca tinha jogado e zerei recentemente. Ótimo jogo com uma história envolvente e puzzles difícieis, achei que não consegueria zerar o jogo, porém o final valeu e MUITO a pena, apesar do sofrimento durante o gameplay o jogo te desafia cada vez mais a raciocinar.

This game, along with the first portal, were my introductions to PC gaming. It taught me how to move and aim competently with a mouse and keyboard. While doing this, the dialog of the robotic characters will have you laughing out loud many times during your play through. The puzzles in the game will really make you think but are oh so satisfying when you solve them. Portal 2's story is also pretty good, It wont win any awards but its fun story that keeps you engaged and wanting to keep solving puzzles. When your'e finished with the story you and a friend can head into co-op mode and solve even more puzzles with even more portals. Overall, I think this game is perfect for both PC newbies and veterans alike. Portal 2 is definitely worth a buy.

Самая лучшая головоломка за всю историю игр, на моё скромное мнение. Как же прост рецепт одной из самых лучших игр в мире. Пройдите головоломку используя только два портала. На прохождение уйдёт гораздо больше времени, чем на первую часть игры. Сюжет не такой простой, если сравнивать с той же первой частью. Он рассказывает о прошлом ГЛаДОС, кто она и как появилась. Появились и новые персонажи, такие как Уитли. Маленький шарообразный робот, который будет вас довольно часто смешить. Появятся новые механики которые разнообразят вашу игру при прохождении очередного теста. После прохождения я довольно долго залипал в ко-опе вместе с другом. Однозначно рекомендую.

[b]10/10: You need at least 200 IQ to play this game - MUST-PLAY[/b]
I just can't describe how I love this game. It doesn't take so much time to finish the game (well, it depends on how good you are at solving the individual puzzles), though if you like challenges and completing achievements, then you will spend bunch of additional hours in this game. Story, atmosphere, soundtrack, graphics, mechanisms, simply everything perfectly fits together. If you enjoy playing with your friends, Portal 2 offers multiplayer levels as well. They are a bit harder and you literally need to cooperate together. Just give it a try. I promise you won't regret it.
This game definitely deserves a place among (my) top games of all time.

Confesso que na primeira vez que fui jogar dropei muito rápido por achar repetitivo e até muito fácil, porém decidi dar mais uma chance e acabei curtindo o game. Um pouco pra metade do jogo as coisas começam a mudar um pouco e sair da linearidade, porém perto do final essa linearidade volta mas em menor escala, cheguei a pensar "Caramba, já não tá na hora de acabar não?", e nada mais que isso, não cheguei a querer desistir como na primeira vez. Anyway o final em si compensa, achei maravilhoso, sem falar no plot que ocorre no meio do jogo. Eu diria que vale a pena, principalmente se for promoção, preço de pastel na feira e você ainda ganha Qi. Não cheguei a testar o online AINDA. That's It. Recomendo.

A la larga de la partida en este videojuego podemos experimentar una cierta paralisis mental al poner un portal frente a otro e ir corriendo como un pajero sin destino, dira que te lleve el viento, pero la historia, te lleva, al, final.
Este titulo es la continuacion de un juegazo, Portal, el cual presenta una mujer, Chell la cual quiere una torticolis y "GlADoS" le dice: que onda bro, queres una torticolis??y la pelotuda de Chell le dice: de una pa', iniciando asi la historia de Chell, una mujer puesta en pruebas para humanos por una especie laboratorio, APERTURE SCIENCE, para asi conseguir su tan deseada torta.A lo largo de la historia podemos ver en repetidas ocasiones a su gran y fiel compañero robot, "Wheatly" [spoiler]al final del dos traiciona a chell[/spoiler] que es su salvador, el cual hace todo lo posible para intentar sacarla de ese infierno.
En mi opinion es un juegazo y vengo esperando hace como ventemil años que me den mi torta, digo el portal 3, dale no sean gatos saben lo que van a facturar con eso?? como mucho.
